title: Paul Reubens will play The Penguin’s father on Gotham
text:
Paul Reubens will play The Penguin’s father on Gotham 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Paul "Pee-wee Herman" Reubens will return to the role he played 23 years ago in Batman Returns, portraying the father of Oswald "The Penguin...
